upgrades.name: Close Quarters Targetting
upgrades.skills: {Ranged} You can perform this {Ranged} while engaged
upgrades.description: You do not suffer the morale test for being engaged with the defender of this {Ranged} (other allies engaged with the defender suffer the morale test as normal).

upgrades.name: Column Tactics
upgrades.description: Your threat is equal to the number of your partial and full ranks.  Your number of ranks for rerolls is equal to the number of trays in your front rank.

upgrades.name: Corruption Rune
upgrades.skills: {Skill} Choose an enemy at range 1-{Natural Energy} and discard the top card of your morale deck.  That enemy suffers damage equal to the number of morale icons on that card, then receives 1 bane baesd on that card's type:
upgrades.description: Confusion: Stun, Doubt: Panic, Fear: Immobilize

upgrades.name: Cursed Signets
upgrades.description: When you would receive 1 or more banes, you instead suffer that number of wounds

upgrades.name: Dispatch Runner
upgrades.skills: {Skill} Exhaust this card to cause another ally at range 1-3 to perform a {Melee}. Then, that ally receives 1 stun token.

upgrades.name: File Runner
upgrades.description: After an enemy collides with you during a charge, perform a {Melee} targeting that enemy before that enemy's {Melee}.  This {Melee} can only be performed while your command dial is revealed with a {Melee} selected.

upgrades.name: Fire Rune
upgrades.skills: {Skill} Perform a {Ranged} rolling 1 red die.  Each {Hit} of this attack causes the defender to suffer damage equal to {Unstable Energy} instead of your threat.

upgrades.name: Flank Guards
upgrades.description: While you are defending, enemies do not add an extra die for flanking you.
